p: Anisaldehyde (Ref.: A88107), diphenylboric acid aminoethyl ester (Ref.: 42810), PEG 400 (Ref.: P3265), and rutin (Ref.: 78095) were obtained from Sigma Chemical Company (St. Louis, MO, USA). Eupatorin was from our own laboratory collection (previously isolated from Salvia officinalis subsp. lavandulifolia leaves). Acetic acid, formic acid, sulfuric acid, dichloromethane, ethanol, ethyl acetate, methanol, and toluene were of analytical grade and purchased from Panreac Química (Barcelona, Spain). HPTLC glass plates coated with Silicagel 60F 254 (20 × 10 cm) were purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany; Ref.: 1.05642.0001).
